mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TalentBoard (talDocNO, memNO, title, contentHave, contentWant, excCalls, views, STATE) VALUES ('TB_A' || LPAD(TalentBoard_seq.nextval, 5, 0), 'MEM_A00001', #{title}, #{contentHave}, #{contentWant}, 0, 0, 2)
mapper.update: update TalentBoard set title=#{title}, contentHave=#{contentHave}, repairDate=sysdate where talDocNO=#{talDocNO}
update TalentBoard set title=#{title}, contentWant=#{contentWant}, repairDate=sysdate WHERE talDocNO = #{talDocNO}
mapper.select: select talDocNO,nickName,writeDate,contentHave,excCalls,contentWant,title,TalentBoard.memNO from TalentBoard,Member where TalentBoard.memNO = Member.memNO AND talDocNO=#{talDocNO}
SELECT talDocNO, title, contentHave, contentWant, writeDate, memNO FROM TalentBoard ORDER BY talDocNO DESC

sql.if: AND ((title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%') OR (contentHave LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%') OR (contentWant LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%') OR (nickName LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ))

mapper.select:
SELECT TB.TALDocNO, title, contentHave, contentWant,writeDate, M.nickName, TB.memNO, TB.state from NP_TalHave TH,TalentBoard TB,Member M WHERE TB.memNO = M.memNO AND TH.TALDocNO = TB.TALDocNO
GROUP BY TB.TALDocNO, title, contentHave, contentWant,writeDate, M.nickName, TB.memNO, TB.state order by talDocNO desc

SELECT TB.TALDocNO,DT.name from NP_TalHave TH,TalentBoard TB,Member M ,DF_TALDIV DT WHERE TB.memNO = M.memNO AND TH.TALDocNO = TB.TALDocNO AND DT.talDivDF = TH.talDivDF
GROUP BY TB.TALDocNO, title, contentHave, contentWant,writeDate, M.nickName, TB.memNO,DT.name, TB.state order by talDocNO desc

SELECT TB.TALDocNO,DT.name from NP_TalWant TW,TalentBoard TB,Member M ,DF_TALDIV DT WHERE TB.memNO = M.memNO AND TW.TALDocNO = TB.TALDocNO AND DT.talDivDF = TW.talDivDF
GROUP BY TB.TALDocNO, title, contentHave, contentWant,writeDate, M.nickName, TB.memNO,DT.name, TB.state order by talDocNO desc
SELECT * FROM NP_TalHave NATURAL JOIN DF_TALDIV where talDocNO = #{talDocNO}
SELECT * FROM NP_TalWant NATURAL JOIN DF_TALDIV where talDocNO = #{talDocNO}
SELECT count(*) FROM TalentBoard, Member WHERE TalentBoard.memNO = Member.memNO
